com.jaxson.lib.util

Interface Saveable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameConfig, GdxSaveObject, GsonObject, SaveObject

    public interface Saveable
    Interface to save any Object.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jaxson Van Doorn

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Saveable.SaveBehavior
      Indicate the Saveable.SaveBehavior of a Object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean autoSaves()
      Gets whether the Object auto saves.
      Saveable.SaveBehavior getSaveBehavior()
      Gets the Saveable.SaveBehavior of the Object.
      java.lang.String getSavePath()
      Sets the save path where the Object saves.
      boolean hasSaveData()
      Gets whether the Object has a save file.
      java.lang.String read()
      Reads the save file and sets the Object's instance to it's values.
      void save()
      Saves the current Object to a file.
      void setSaveBehavior(Saveable.SaveBehavior saveBehavior)
      Sets the Saveable.SaveBehavior of the Object.
      void setSavePath(java.lang.String savePath)
      Sets the save path where the Object saves.
      void smartRead()
      Searches for a save file and if one exists it reads it.

        Reads the save file and sets the Object's instance to it's values.

        Saves the current Object to a file.

      • setSavePath

        Sets the save path where the Object saves.
        Parameters:
        savePath - The save path where the Object saves

      • smartRead

        void smartRead()
        Searches for a save file and if one exists it reads it. Otherwise it creates one.
